meta.name: description
meta.value: The user asked what a setting value is.

parameter.name: setting
parameter.description: The setting that the user asked about.

parameter.name: settingValueToBeConfirmed
parameter.description: This is true if the user asked whether the setting is on, false if the user asked if the setting is off, and null if the user did not specify.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: Whether the dialog should include additional detail or not.

parameter.name: deviceState
parameter.description: Contains details about the userâ€™s device.
